meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Special Recognition
agenda_items.description: Celebrating Michael Haynes on his retirement after 31 years of service and dedication to the City of Dallas and the Park & Recreation Department

agenda_items.title: Kiest Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize a professional services contract with AEC Holdco, LLC DBA Grace Herbert Curtis Architects, LLC for architectural and engineering services for the schematic design, design development, construction documents, bidding and negotiation, and construction administration for the renovation of three recreation center facilities.

agenda_items.title: Halperin Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize the naming of the H-E-B Main Stage Fountain at Halperin Park. This is a 20-year naming opportunity which is in compliance with the Park Board Naming Policy.

agenda_items.title: Aquatic Fees
agenda_items.description: Authorize an increase to the specified aquatic fees at all City of Dallas aquatics facilities and Dallas Independent School District Partnership Program.

agenda_items.title: Other/Non-Action Items
agenda_items.description: Park and Recreation Board Members liaison reports and Staff Announcements â€“ Upcoming Park and Recreation Department Events

agenda_items.title: Next Meeting
agenda_items.description: Next Park Board Meeting will be on Thursday, April 17, 2025, at 10:00 a.m.

financial_items.description: Authorize a professional services contract for architectural and engineering services for the renovation of three recreation center facilities.
Authorize an increase to the specified aquatic fees at all City of Dallas aquatics facilities.
